name: Bite Target
description:
When receiving damage dealt by Mualani or Shark Missile: Remove this effect. For each stack, increase the damage by 2.
(Stacks are accumulative, with no limit.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When receiving damage dealt by $[A1214] or <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112144]</color>:</color> Remove this effect. For each stack, increase the damage by 2.\n(Stacks are accumulative, with no limit.)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When receiving damage dealt by Mualani or <color=#FFFFFFFF>Shark Missile</color>:</color> Remove this effect. For each stack, increase the damage by 2.\n(Stacks are accumulative, with no limit.)
